Name: Mimosa
Description: Here's my advice: have a little faith and, if that doesn't work, have a lot of mimosas.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Aquí está mi consejo: ten un poco de fe y, si eso no funciona, ten muchas mimosas.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 조언을 해줄게요: 일단 믿음을 가지세요, 그리고 만약 잘 안된다면, 미모사를 많이 드세요.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Hier ist mein Rat: Habe ein wenig Vertrauen und, wenn das nicht funktioniert, eine Menge Mimosen.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Mon conseil: beaucoup de foi, et si ça ne marche pas, beaucoup de mimosas.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Aqui está meu conselho: Tenha um pouco de fé e se não funcionar, tem muitas mimosas.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Вот мой совет: имейте немного веры и, если это не сработает, имейте много мимоз.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: İşte tavsiyem: biraz inancın olsun ve, eğer işe yaramazsa, bir sürü mimosan olsun.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 含羞草。这是我的忠告：人要有一点信念，如果不这样的话，那可能会需要很多害羞草。
